statements: DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 OR quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 5 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE seller = 'John Doe' AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE buyer_id = 2 AND quantity >= 10;
DELETE FROM sellers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE total_price > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM product_category WHERE category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM categories WHERE name = 'Electronics');
